properties.title: Swin Golf
properties.abstract: Swin Golf is aimed at all ages and suitable for families or groups. It is fun for amateurs as well as more experienced players with no licence or special equipment.
properties.description: Swin-Golf is more simple, more relaxing, more fun and - most important - less costly than real golf. Everyone is welcome to discover this simplified version of golf. La Caquerelle is located on the ridge to the north of St-Ursanne, the medieval town that is the gateway to the Clos du Doubs nature park. To make the journey easier, cycles or e-bikes can be hired at the St-Ursanne Tourism Office.
properties.name: Jura Tourisme
